title: "AI Edge Computing Firm Blaize Closes $71M Series D Round"
excerpt: "Blaize, the AI computing innovator revolutionizing edge and automotive computing solutions, last week announced the closing of a $71m Series D round of funding. Blaize delivers to customers a distinct fusion of AI hardware and AI Studio end-to-end software platform that leads the industry in productization of high-value knowledge-driven edge computing solutions."
